metadata.title: CVE-2020-15227 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Nette versions before 2.0.19, 2.1.13, 2.2.10, 2.3.14, 2.4.16, 3.0.6 arevulnerable to an code injection attack by passing specially formedparameters to URL that may possibly leading to RCE. Nette is a PHP/ComposerMVC Framework.

criterions.comment: php-nette: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
